def_cn: (衣服、书等)破烂的，破旧的
def_en: If something such as clothing or a book is tattered, it is damaged or torn, especially because it has been used a lot over a long period of time.

def_cn: 损坏严重的;一败涂地的
def_en: If you describe something as tattered, you mean that it has been badly damaged or has failed completely.
